Strength.name: Grapple Specialist
Strength.description: +2 to Unarmed checks to start or break grapples.

Strength.name: Breaker
Strength.description: Your melee attacks ignore 1 point of armor reduction on the hit body part.

Strength.name: Clinch Fighter
Strength.description: While grappling, you gain +2 to Block (Unarmed).

Intelligence.name: Field Medic
Intelligence.description: +2 to Medicine when treating a Health Crisis or applying rest treatment.

Intelligence.name: Tinkerer
Intelligence.description: +2 to Repair; clearing a weapon jam gains +2.

Intelligence.name: Sapper
Intelligence.description: On missed thrown explosives, reduce scatter by 1 tile.

Intelligence.name: Circuit Ghost
Intelligence.description: +2 to Electronics/Lockpick when bypassing powered doors or locks.

Dexterity.name: Quickdraw
Dexterity.description: Once per turn, you may swap a hand‑held item for free.

Dexterity.name: Controlled Burst
Dexterity.description: Reduce Burst and Auto fire penalties by 2.

Dexterity.name: Catfoot
Dexterity.description: If you end your turn in cover, gain +1 to defense until your next turn.

Constitution.name: Crisis Manager
Constitution.description: Your personal Health Crisis timer is +1 turn longer.

Constitution.name: Thick‑Skinned
Constitution.description: Reduce incoming Fire, Explosive, and Acid damage by 1 (before limb split).

Constitution.name: Endure
Constitution.description: Reduce hunger/thirst damage by 1 when it would be applied.

Constitution.name: Fortified Frame
Constitution.description: +1 max HP to all body parts.

Perception.name: Eagle Eye
Perception.description: +1 tile to vision radius in adequate light.

Perception.name: Rangefinder
Perception.description: Reduce non‑close range penalties by 1 (Long/Very Long/Extremely Long).

Perception.name: Spotter
Perception.description: +2 to Investigation checks to detect traps or hidden containers.

Willpower.name: Steadfast
Willpower.description: +2 to Willpower checks to resist fear/panic‑like effects.

Willpower.name: Unshakable
Willpower.description: +1 to defense while at 50% total HP or lower.

Willpower.name: Last Push
Willpower.description: The first time you would gain Exhaustion in a combat, delay it until combat ends.

Charisma.name: Squad Leader
Charisma.description: Allies within 5 tiles increase their cover bonus by +1 (to a max of +1 from this perk).
